subcategory.name: About Pages
subcategory.description: About page examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS about page examples to introduce your organization to new and existing customers and clients. These about pages are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
